verbs.description: One of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un 's top officials [V: is] traveling to the United States and will meet Secretary of State Mike Pompeo as the two countries lay the groundwork for on - again , off - again talks between Kim and US President Donald Trump in Singapore on June 12 .

[ARG0: One of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un 's top officials] is [V: traveling] [ARG1: to the United States] and will meet Secretary of State Mike Pompeo as the two countries lay the groundwork for on - again , off - again talks between Kim and US President Donald Trump in Singapore on June 12 .
